name: Little Digital Friends
description:
Little Digital Friends is a game heavily inspired by the 'Tamagotchi' pets.

In this game you feed raise and most importantly evolve your slime friend.

There are 14 different and unique friends to find.

But be carful if you do not look after your friend correctly they will run off in search of a better home.

We also have 4 options of music to select and relax to, 2 are up beat Pop tracks composed by Mossy (found on YouTube or Spotify) and the other 2 are public domain classical pieces("Four Seasons Winter" and "Adagio in G Minor").
